snippet: The theater company announced that it would move forward with a project which seeks to create a video archive of interviews.
abstract: Theater company Primary Stages says it will move forward with its Off Broadway Oral History Project, which seeks to create video archive of interviews with actors, directors, designers, producers, playwrights and theater founders who have participated in Off and Off Off Broadway since World War II.
lead_paragraph: The theater company announced that it would move forward with a project which seeks to create a video archive of interviews.

headline.print_headline: Oral History Project at Primary Stages
headline.main: Oral History Project at Primary Stages
